Description:
LOCATION, COMFORT & EASY LIVING
Sahil Kakar & The Eleet Group are proud to present another marvellous, spacious & spectacular home in one of the most prominent location in Craigieburn at 20 Scarborough Tce.
This home provides you a free flowing floor plan inside & a bold look outside. In midst of spec homes this beauty was once a display home(The Mornington Display) which has preserved its glamour for past number of years. Exquisitely maintained, it has been a home to caring owners, therefore providing an excellent opportunity to a first home buyer, an investor or an upsizing family.
Sitting on an massive 575SQM land allotment, this sizeable 29sq home is a treat for any home buyer or investor. Only on the rarest occasion does an allotment offering such dramatic dimensions and irresistible potential become available in such rewarding context as this sought after location, here in the heart of Craigieburn. This grand location is walking distance to 4 top schools in vicinity of 850 metres to 2kms, 900 metres to Highland Shopping Centre & highlands hotel, 6 mins to Craigieburn Station & Craigieburn Central, 3 mins to Pelican child Care & 5 mins to Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre, making this an uncompromising location.
Boasting a sun drenched wide footage & sleek contemporary spaces, this immaculate home offers a stylish lifestyle.The residents can also enjoy 2 side entrance and exit from the lounge & dining area to the side and back yard. The fully decked alfresco at the back provides the best means for outdoor entertainment for small or large gatherings.
Overall the residence is equipped with quality fixtures and fittings throughout and is beautifully presented.
** Master Bedroom with Walk In Robe & a Sizeable En-suite
** Ducted Heating & Evaporative Cooling
** Seperate Study
** 5.5 Kw Solar Panels to avoid any shocks with increasing electricity prices
** Large spacious Kitchen with 900MM stainless steel appliances & plenty of quality cabinetry for storage
** Fully decked Large Alfresco area for outdoor entertainment accompanied by 4 roller mesh/weather sheet
** Foldable back yard entrance glass door
** Porcelain tiles matched with quality carpeting in bedrooms
** Automated Double Garage
** Wide 18M Frontage
** 8 CCTV Cameras for your security 24*7 & front entrance crime safe door
** Feature walls to uplift the ambience & beauty of the home
This opportunity gives you the dream home you always wanted & is not to be missed.
Call Sahil on 0401 926 466 to arrange an inspection as this wont last long.
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions are approximate only. Particulars given are for general information only and do not constitute any representation on the part of the vendor or agent.
Please see the below link for an up-to-date copy of the Due Diligence Check List: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Virtual Tours Available on Request
Internal area
267m²

Description:
Family Living on the Green
Tee off from your front door step with this amazing opportunity in the heart of the family friendly Fairways Estate.
Defined by its intelligent design and long list of inclusions, this spacious home presents an outstanding lifestyle for families looking to secure their future in a quiet cul-de-sac. The home's free-flowing interior comprises 4 great size bedrooms (master with WIR and ensuite), sparkling family bathroom, spacious living zones including a oversized seperate lounge, and an expansive open-plan family/dining area complemented by a well- appointed kitchen with ample bench space, HUGE walk-in-pantry, and stainless steel appliances.
Step outside to a private backyard with alfresco area - perfect for those that like to entertain! Further features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, great privacy, double remote garage with internal entry, and much more.
Within seconds to Craigieburn's Public Golf Course and Aitken Creek trails, this home is also close to Schools, Public Transport, Local Shops, both Craigieburn Central Shopping Centre & Craigieburn Plaza Shopping Centre and many more Craigieburn amenities. What a home, what a location!
Insights: 3 Greystone Place, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2020 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Corner Gem
Calling out to the first home buyers, families, and developers, set in a quiet location is this brick veneer home. Comprising 3 large bedrooms, master with full ensuite other rooms with built in wardrobes, a study/4th bedroom, a bright family area. A second family area adjoining meals area. A large bright functional kitchen with lots of space, central bathroom and laundry, an outdoor decking, a second outdoor entertainment area and a corner access to multiple car parks.
Features include:
Split system, ducted heating, solar panels, dish washer, 900mm stainless steel appliances, sky light window shutters and spa.
What we love about the property?
Set on a large corner block approx. 642M2.
Walking distance to schools.
Walking distance to shops.
Walking distance to bus stops.
Development site (STCA).
A short drive to Craigieburn central.
Walking distance to the train station.
Side access.
The list goes on, to inspect Call now 0425 778 166

Description:
SIZEABLE Living, Desirable Location.
Without question one of Craigieburn's most exciting homes, designed & skillfully built by Henley, be amazed by this wonderful 26sq* family home which welcomes you with its touch of style, character & class & is ideal for the astute purchaser who loves to entertain the masses.
Nestled in an elite location, within walking distance to Gallantry Avenue walking trails, wetlands, Aston Fields sporting fields & spread out on the perfect 400m2 allotment, this sensational home will no doubt be the envy of all family & friends forever!
Comprising 4 great sized bedrooms, master with custom walk-in-robe and dual vanity ensuite, 2 inviting living zones, conveniently placed dining area, a striking stone-top kitchen, fully equipped with 900mm stainless steel appliances, and walk-in pantry. The kitchen is truly sublime!
Step outside, fire up the BBQ under your wonderful pergola setting & be amazed by the generous proportions that the private backyard provides which effortlessly meets up with the home to provide the ultimate indoor/outdoor integration. Truly the perfect haven for the all seasons entertainer & for kids to play until their heart's content in complete privacy.
With an abundance of amazing upgrades including a double remote garage with internal access, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, alarm, CCTV, beautiful engineered floors, stone-benchtops throughout and a sense of relief that all the money has been spent on absolutely everything.
If quality, space and location are high on your agenda, then this property needs to be on your must-inspect list!
Insights: 9 Lush Drive, Craigieburn VIC 3064 was last sold in 2015 and 351 other 4 bedroom house in Craigieburn have recently been sold.

Description:
Titled land at Dream Location !!
Nestled amongst some of the area's finest properties & measuring a whopping 448m2 (Approx) with its commanding stance 14m frontage, providing immense building options for the lucky buyer. This home site is the perfect position to build a distinguished home that will have some of the best views to the Melbourne skyline that you will ever see. Situated close to Hume Grammar, Hume Highway, Craigieburn Central, Mt. Ridley College and other important amenities, this large parcel of land will suit all house types. With a limited number of blocks in this prestigious estate available, now is the time to capitalise on this wonderful opportunity.
Land with city views (Panorama Views) and without easement!!
Let your imagination run wild and construct your new home with absolute confidence!
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
Advert Agent: Harminder Singh

Description:
Contemporary Style with a Flawless Finish!
Every room filled with natural light, this single-level home provides a ready-to-enjoy family lifestyle opportunity with its intelligent design, quality inclusions and absolutely impeccable presentation from start to finish.
Set on a sizeable corner block in a family focused Hamilton Park neighbourhood, the home's picture-perfect interior showcases a large master bedroom with WIR and private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (BIRs), main central bathroom and separate WC.
Dual living zones enhance its appeal including a spacious front lounge leading through to the versatile open-plan family/dining area and well-appointed kitchen complete with new cooking appliances (oven, rangehood and gas cooktop).
Other stand-out features include ducted heating throughout, new carpets, new blinds, alarm system and family-sized laundry, plus a sizable backyard with northerly aspect, internally-accessed garage (r/c) and additional driveway parking space.
Moments from parks and playgrounds, it's also walking distance to Grand Boulevard buses, local shops and childcare centre, popular schools, as well as easy access to Craigieburn's major shopping centres and the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Enormous Block with Sub-Division & Development Potential (S.T.C.A) !!
Please call Agent to arrange an inspection - Only 1 Person at a time!!!
INSPECTIONS BY APPOINTMENT ONLY.
This expansive property is full of opportunity making it a great investment choice. The block is large enough to maintain the existing home while developing the remainder of the property (subject to council approval) as a sub-division, with existing access through the current driveway.Main features include:
- Huge block ideal for sub-division (STCA) with existing access.
- Ideal location acroos from local shops.
- Freshly painted.
- Sizeable pergola for outdoor dining/living.
- Open-plan kitchen/dining with pergola access.
- Large L shape living.
- 4 comfortable bedrooms with BIRs ( master with full ensuite).
- Functional bathroom plus separate WC & laundry.
- Central heating & air conditioning (split).
- Extra room for multiple cars, boat, caravan, etc.
Whether you choose to maintain the property as it is, or you choose to sub-divide, this property is a great choice.
Located within close distance to local shops, transport, schools and shopping centre, this excellent opportunity should not be missed.
Don't miss this rare opportunity, book an inspection with our team today!
DISCLAIMER: All stated dimensions in the content and photos are approximate only. ***PHOTO ID REQUIRED AT ALL INSPECTIONS***
Due diligence check list: http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.

Description:
Spacious Modern Townhouse in Perfect Location
A spacious two-bedroom townhouse is a perfect first home or great investment opportunity
Featuring a great floor plan with the entrance leading into a large tiled living and dining zone that opens to the private and secure courtyard.
A well-appointed kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, dishwasher and overhead storage space.
The carpeted stairway leads to two bedrooms on the second level, both with walk-in robes and shared family bathroom.
Other features include split system heating & cooling, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher, 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, 2 toilets, alfresco, single remote garage and a European laundry
Ideally positioned opposite Stockland Highlands Shopping Centre, Moth Park, Highlands Hotel, also a close distance to public transport and also your choice of Craigieburn's best schools, including Aitken Creek Primary, Mt Ridley College and Hume Anglican Grammar.
* Coronavirus Update
At Xynergy Realty the health and wellbeing of our clients and team members is our highest priority.
In light of the recent Coronavirus outbreak, we are taking measures to protect our clients and team members from coming into contact with the virus, and request that you do not attend an Open for Inspection if you have:
- Tested positive to Coronavirus
- Symptoms associated with Coronavirus
- Recently been in contact with someone diagnosed with Coronavirus
- Recently been overseas
- Agreed to any self-isolation conditions
We also ask that you maintain adequate social distancing from anyone attending the open for inspection, including other prospective clients and Xynergy sales team and where possible refrain from touching surfaces within the property. We also appreciate your understanding if you are requested to wait outside to reduce the number of people in the property at a time.
Thank you for your understanding.
Please bring your proof of identity (i.e. driver's license).
Inspect now before it's too late!

Description:
The Perfect Place to Create Your Future!
This is where the dream begins! Fully-titled, this generous Highlands allotment provides an ideal blank canvas on which to build your brand-new home with its uniform dimensions, minimal gradient & prime location in one of Craigieburn's favourite new neighbourhoods.
Approximately 337m2 in total (13.5m frontage x 25m depth), the block offers all the space required to bring the design of your dreams to reality & is ideally situated to take full
advantage of Highlands' impressive masterplan amenities.
Highlander Drive buses at the end of the street, it also offers close proximity to Craigieburn's expanding range of kinder/childcare facilities, primary & secondary schools, popular parks, playgrounds & shopping centres, as well as easy access to both Mickleham Road & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Amazing Opportunity on 626m2*
First time offered for sale is this much loved and cherished family home. Impeccably presented, this proud beauty is perfect for all home buyers & investors alike.
Conveniently tucked away in a whisper quiet court, enter a flexible floorplan which comprises 4 spacious bedrooms all with ceiling fans, (master bedroom with walk-in-robe & private ensuite), central bathroom, front formal living room, large kitchen with great bench space & storage, adjoining bright meals leading to an over sized family room spilling out to a wonderful large undercover pergola area perfect for the all seasons entertainer.
Features include, heating, cooling, alarm system, double carport, established gardens, private rear yard with 2 storage sheds & all this on a whopping 626m2 (approx) of prime Craigieburn real estate.
Positioned to please in the heart of Craigieburn and within minutes to Craigieburn Plaza Shopping Centre, Craigieburn Train Station, local schools, childcare facilities, Malcolm Creek trails and much more.
An opportunity like this won't last, call now!

Description:
Exceptional Modern Living
Set in the most perfect position, a stone's throw away from schools, Craigieburn Central, Splash Centre, parklands and much, much more. Walk to all the amenities in just a few moments. Lead a convenient lifestyle or invest in this great opportunity today.
This three bedroom home offers value and convenience all in one package. With a natural light filled living area, kitchen and meals area opening up to the courtyard with a covered alfresco and ample outdoor space, this is perfect for that entertainer in you.
The kitchen is spacious and equipped with stainless steel appliances, dishwasher, storage pantry and plenty of counter top space for that chef in your home.
Upstairs you are presented with 2 bedrooms with BIRs plus, a spacious Master bedroom, walk in wardrobe and an ensuite. The sparkling central bathroom services the remaining 2 bedrooms.
Additional features include:
- Ducted heating and split system cooling
- Double Car Garage
- Ducted vacuum
- Alarm system
- Video intercom
- Side drive through access
- Powder room
If location and luxury is what you are looking for, then look no further.

Description:
The pinnacle of the north
Upon entry to this amazing single story residence you will be instantly comforted by its 'homely feel'. jam packed with quality features, no stone has been left un-turned when building this near new master piece. Situated in a prestigious estate of Craigieburn, you should come check this home out before its sold.
Main Features include:
- Three large living zones
- Kitchen with: under mount sink, Calcutta stone bench tops, pendant lights, stainless steel appliances ( two ovens and electric cooktop), dishwasher and large walk in pantry with sink
- Two bathrooms with tile from floor to ceiling and outstanding quality throughout
- Ducted vacuum system
- Ducted heating an refrigerated cooling (heating/cooling is individually zoned to each room and is wifi controlled)
- Beautiful alfresco zone with outdoor kitchen and ceiling fan
- Alarm system and an abundance of down lights internally/externally
- polished concrete flooring
- Amazing sheer curtains through-out
Preferred sale terms:
settlement - 45/60/90 days
Deposit - 10%
Ali Celik
04314894438
ali.celik@harcourtsrp.com.au
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
MODERN | LOCATION | TWO KITCHEN
Positioned in the highly desirable Lakeside Estate, within minutes to Craigieburn Central and list of important amenities. This home is one of the hottest to hit the market so don't miss it. This spectacular family home denotes quality at every turn.
The feel of modern lifestyle living, this residence offers sleek and spacious luxury low maintenance living. Cleverly configured to accentuate natural light, this free-flowing 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home effortlessly combines the contemporary comforts of sunlit open-plan living, whilst delivering a high level of sophistication and style.
Upon stepping through the front door, you are greeted by the grand entrance, .There are four massive bedrooms, the Master suite features a large walk in robe, stunning en-suite, double shower and floor to ceiling tiled walls, while three bedrooms offer mirrored built in robes. Separate laundry with ample storage space. the list goes on! A light filled living and dining area include tile floors, and an open plan kitchen featuring quality stone benches, the latest soft closing cabinetry, SSA appliances, dishwasher and lets not forget the walk in butlers pantry. This home truly has it all, Sliding doors that open up to an absolutely beautiful alfresco with a 2nd kitchen having stone bench top and storage cabinets underneath ,leading out to the no maintenance rear yard that is sure to impress you.
Other features include
Fully functional second Separate kitchen with storage in alfresco
A secure double lock up garage with internal access,
Ducted heating, Refrigerated Cooling,
Square set ceilings throughout and only the absolute highest quality possible.
All of this and much more, located only seconds away from a beautiful walking track, soccer and football oval, public BBQ area within very close proximity to all key amenities, Schools, Transport and Craigieburn Shopping centre .
Make sure that 37 Lemon Myrtle, Craigieburn is on your shopping list.
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers - http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist.
This document has been prepared to assist solely in the marketing of this property. Description:
Brand New Affordable Home
Bombay Real Estate is proud to present 10 MOTTLECAH CIRCUIT, CRAIGIEBURN .The quality & Style of this 3 Bedroom house will impress you . With a vibrant, charismatic personality & engineered designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living.
Comprising a well appointed kitchen with Stone Bench Tops & stainless steel appliances overlooking the meals/family area, Master Bedroom with walk in robe and remaining bedrooms with BIR'S, double lock up garage with internal access plus much more. Outside surrounded by a low maintenance backyard. Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including Newbury Primary school, Aitken Creek Primary School, child care facility, and other local amenities be quick to inspect ! As this one won't hang around for long!
This home is designed to accommodate both first home buyers and investors with good rental return!!!!!
Other extras include
High ceilings
heating and cooling
Alarm system
Intercom
Downlights
Remote garage
And much more..
Images For Illustrative Purposes

http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
A Gem in a Haystack
This Metricon built beauty, set on a large allotment of approximately 519m2 is instantly inviting and surprisingly spacious, this family-friendly entertainer offers so much more than initially meets the eye. Prepare yourself for a luxury lifestyle with additional indoor/outdoor living areas in this supersized 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom home with Aitken Creek Primary School literally at your doorstep.
Beyond a welcoming entrance hallway and a versatile floor plan the home spectacularly opens up to reveal spacious open-plan living and dining alongside a sparkling kitchen boasting high-quality stainless-steel appliances and a sleek stone-topped island bench, perfect for entertaining.
Instantly shift into relaxation mode with a second living area/rumpus that is looking out to a fully decked pergola/ entertainment area closed off with zip blinds for the family to enjoy all year round. This all-weather area will be used on a daily basis for private lounging, informal dining and memorable celebrating.
The main bedroom is graced with a walk-in robe and a fully renovated en-suite with his and hers double basins and tiles to ceilings, while the remaining 3 robed bedrooms are privately zoned to one side of the home, peacefully tucked away behind a connecting hallway and accompanied with a child retreat and the central bathroom.
Additional features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, a remote-controlled 2-car garage offering internal and external entry, laminate timber flooring, landscaped gardens, window furnishings, down-lights throughout, garden shed, intercom, camera surveillance system with 6 cameras, separate laundry and WC.
Location couldn't get any better with all key amenities within minutes away. Close proximity to local schools, childcare centres, restaurants, shopping centres, parks, library, Splash aquatic centre, gyms, transport and much more
Contact Lem Djemal on 0427 579 365 to register your interest and avoid missing out.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
BRAND NEW - Nest or Invest!
100% REAL ESTATE proudly presents this brand new 3 bedroom home currently under construction in ever popular Highlands estate.
Whether you are a first home buyer, savvy investor or just wanting a fresh change, then this home is for you!
Upon entering it offers contemporary elegance and commanding street presence in a prime location close to all established amenities.
This elegant three-bedroom family home has everything you need. This beautiful appointed homes has space, light and a maximised free-flowing floor plan.
Features Include:
> Generous size master with walk in robe & ensuite
> Remaining 2 additional bedrooms with built in robes
> Gourmet kitchen with stone bench tops, ample storage & pantry
> 900mm stainless steel appliances & dishwasher
> Open plan living and dining area
> Spacious main bathroom with separate toilet
> Ducted heating & Evaporative cooling
> 2.7m high ceilings
> Floor to ceiling tiles in main bathroom & ensuite
> Floorboards throughout (Living & Bedrooms)
> Front landscaping
> Double car garage with internal access
> Exposed aggregate driveway & much more!
Be sure to secure this property and save on stamp duties, whilst it is under construction.
Call us today!
A great range of other House & Land options available to suit all budgets.
Internal area
167m²

Description:
7 Grattan Cove SOLD! 5 Grattan Cove Under Contract!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 5 & 7 Grattan Cove Craigieburn. Perfectly positioned right in the heart of Craigieburn with Craigieburn Central, Splash Aqua Park, library, medical centre and public transport all seconds away, simply leave the car at home. Both properties showcase one bedroom and bathroom downstairs, and upstairs presents a further two bedroom and bathroom along with an open plan living/dining/kitchen with stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and stone benchtops. Fantastic extras include balcony, courtyard, European style laundry, single car remote control garage, multiple split systems, alarm and intercoms. Currently leased investors can enjoy rental income from day one whilst first home buyers this is the place to call home!
